title: Funding opportunity: BBSRC new investigator award: 2025 round 3: applicant-led mode
organization: Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council
description: Apply for funding to support excellent new investigator-led research across the breadth of Biotechnology and Biological Sciences Research Council (BBSRC) scientific remit. This scheme is designed primarily to assist newly employed university lecturers, researchers (at a level equivalent to lecturer) in research council institutes, and fellows (at a level equivalent to lecturer) to secure their first major element of research support funding. The full economic cost (FEC) of your project can be up to Â£2 million. Funding is available for up to five years. BBSRC will fund 80% of the FEC.
